00032 // Custom validator defintions
00033 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00034 
00035 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int64_t *, int) {
00036   validators::check_first_occurrence(v);
00037   const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00038   char *last;
00039   int64_t result = strtoll(s.c_str(), &last, 0);
00040 
00041   if (s.c_str() == last)
00042     throw invalid_option_value(s);
00043 
00044   switch (*last) {
00045     case 'k':
00046     case 'K': result *= 1000LL;         break;
00047     case 'm':
00048     case 'M': result *= 1000000LL;      break;
00049     case 'g':
00050     case 'G': result *= 1000000000LL;   break;
00051     case '\0':                          break;
00052     default: throw invalid_option_value(s +": unknown suffix");
00053   }
00054   v = any(result);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int32_t *, int) {
00058   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00059   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00060 
00061   if (res > INT32_MAX || res < INT32_MIN) {
00062     const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00063     throw invalid_option_value(s +": number out of range of 32-bit integer");
00064   }
00065   v = any((int32_t)res);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, uint16_t *, int) {
00069   validate(v, values, (int64_t *)0, 0);
00070   int64_t res = any_cast<int64_t>(v);
00071 
00072   if (res > UINT16_MAX) {
00073     const std::string &s = validators::get_single_string(values);
00074     throw invalid_option_value(s +": number out of range of 16-bit integer");
00075   }
00076   v = any((uint16_t)res);
00077 }

00084 void
00085 parse(command_line_parser &parser, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00086       variables_map &result, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00087       const PositionalDesc *p) {
00088   try {
00089     PropertiesDesc full(desc);
00090 
00091     if (hidden)
00092       full.add(*hidden);
00093 
00094     parser.options(full);
00095 
00096     if (p)
00097       parser.positional(*p);
00098 
00099     store(parser.run(), result);
00100     notify(result);
00101   }
00102   catch (std::exception &e) {
00103     HT_THROW(Error::CONFIG_BAD_ARGUMENT, e.what());
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 } // local namespace

00110 void
00111 Properties::load(const String &fname, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00112                  bool allow_unregistered) {
00113   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00114 
00115   try {
00116     std::ifstream in(fname.c_str());
00117 
00118     if (!in)
00119       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s", strerror(errno));
00120 
00121 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 103500
00122     store(parse_config_file(in, desc, allow_unregistered), m_map);
00123 #else
00124     store(parse_config_file(in, desc), m_map);
00125 #endif
00126   }
00127   catch (std::exception &e) {
00128     HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_CFG_FILE, "%s: %s", fname.c_str(), e.what());
00129   }
00130 }

00132 void
00133 Properties::parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00134                        const PropertiesDesc *hidden, const PositionalDesc *p) {
00135   // command_line_parser can't seem to handle argc = 0
00136   const char *dummy = "_";
00137 
00138   if (argc < 1) {
00139     argc = 1;
00140     argv = (char **)&dummy;
00141   }
00142   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00143     command_line_parser parser(argc, argv);
00144     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p));
00145 }
00146 
00147 void
00148 Properties::parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args,
00149                        const PropertiesDesc &desc, const PropertiesDesc *hidden,
00150                        const PositionalDesc *p) {
00151   HT_TRY("parsing arguments",
00152     command_line_parser parser(args);
00153     parse(parser, desc, m_map, hidden, p));
00154 }

00156 void Properties::alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00157                        bool overwrite) {
00158   if (overwrite)
00159     m_alias_map[primary] = secondary;
00160   else
00161     m_alias_map.insert(std::make_pair(primary, secondary));
00162 
00163   m_need_alias_sync = true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void Properties::sync_aliases() {
00167   if (!m_need_alias_sync)
00168     return;
00169 
00170   foreach(const AliasMap::value_type &v, m_alias_map) {
00171     Map::iterator it1 = m_map.find(v.first);
00172     Map::iterator it2 = m_map.find(v.second);
00173 
00174     if (it1 != m_map.end()) {
00175       if (it2 == m_map.end())           // secondary missing
00176         m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.second, (*it1).second));
00177       else if (!(*it1).second.defaulted())
00178         (*it2).second = (*it1).second;  // non-default primary trumps
00179       else if (!(*it2).second.defaulted())
00180         (*it1).second = (*it2).second;  // otherwise use non-default secondary
00181     }
00182     else if (it2 != m_map.end()) {      // primary missing
00183       m_map.insert(std::make_pair(v.first, (*it2).second));
00184     }
00185   }
00186   m_need_alias_sync = false;
00187 }

00189 // need to be updated when adding new option type
00190 String Properties::to_str(const boost::any &v) {
00191   if (v.type() == typeid(String))
00192     return boost::any_cast<String>(v);
00193 
00194   if (v.type() == typeid(uint16_t))
00195     return format("%u", (unsigned)boost::any_cast<uint16_t>(v));
00196 
00197   if (v.type() == typeid(int32_t))
00198     return format("%d", boost::any_cast<int32_t>(v));
00199 
00200   if (v.type() == typeid(int64_t))
00201     return format("%llu", (Llu)boost::any_cast<int64_t>(v));
00202 
00203   if (v.type() == typeid(bool)) {
00204     bool bval = boost::any_cast<bool>(v);
00205     return bval ? "true" : "false";
00206   }
00207   if (v.type() == typeid(Strings)) {
00208     const Strings *strs = boost::any_cast<Strings>(&v);
00209     return format_list(*strs);
00210   }
00211   if (v.type() == typeid(Int64s)) {
00212     const Int64s *i64s = boost::any_cast<Int64s>(&v);
00213     return format_list(*i64s);
00214   }
00215 
00216   return format("value of type '%s'", v.type().name());
00217 }

00219 void
00220 Properties::print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default) {
00221   foreach(const Map::value_type &kv, m_map) {
00222     bool isdefault = kv.second.defaulted();
00223 
00224     if (include_default || !isdefault) {
00225       out << kv.first <<'='<< to_str(kv.second.value());
00226 
00227       if (isdefault)
00228         out <<" (default)";
00229 
00230       out << std::endl;
00231     }
00232   }
00233 }
